hgr::KeyframeSequence Class Reference
[Hierarchical graphics library]

#include <KeyframeSequence.h>

Inheritance diagram for hgr::KeyframeSequence:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Keyframe sequence of flexible format keyframe data.

void hgr::KeyframeSequence::getKeyframe (  int  index,
void *  data,
int  pitch,
gr::VertexFormat::DataFormat  df,
int  count
)  const
 

Gets key data.

Applies scaling and bias before to returned data.

Parameters:
index First key to set.
data Pointer to source data.
pitch Byte distance between keys in the data.
df Format of source data.
scale Scale for destination data (applied before data usage).
bias Offset to add to destination data after scaling.
count Number of keys to get.

math::float4 hgr::KeyframeSequence::getKeyframe (  int  index  )  const
 

Gets key data.

Applies scaling and bias before to returned data.

Parameters:
index First key to set.
data Pointer to source data.
pitch Byte distance between keys in the data.
df Format of source data.
scale Scale for destination data (applied before data usage).
bias Offset to add to destination data after scaling.
count Number of keys to get.

int hgr::KeyframeSequence::keys (   )  const
 

Returns number of keys in the array.

void hgr::KeyframeSequence::removeRedundantKeys (   ) 
 

Removes keys which don't affect the sequence.

float hgr::KeyframeSequence::scale (   )  const
 

Returns data scale.

void hgr::KeyframeSequence::setBias (  const math::float4  bias  ) 
 

Sets data bias.

Final float4 value is source*scale+bias. Default bias is (0,0,0,0).

void hgr::KeyframeSequence::setKeyframe (  int  index,
const void *  data,
int  pitch,
gr::VertexFormat::DataFormat  df,
float  scale,
const math::float4 &  bias,
int  count
) 
 

Sets key data of variable format.

Parameters:
index First key to set.
data Pointer to source data.
pitch Byte distance between keys in the data.
df Format of source data.
scale Scale for source data.
bias Offset to add to source data after scaling.
count Number of keys to set.

Sets number of keys in the array.

void hgr::KeyframeSequence::setScale (  float  s  ) 
 

Sets data scale.

Final float4 value is source*scale+bias. Default scale is 1.
